metadata.name: Bowie by FEWOCiOUS
metadata.description:
One-of-one NFT from ‘Bowie On The Blockchain’ hosted by The David Bowie Estate & Opensea, benefiting CARE. 

Bowie by FEWOCiOUS is a one-of-one NFT paired with a custom sculpture that explores Bowie’s tangible influence on FEWOCiOUS and the otherworldliness his legacy continues to convey. The seven-foot-tall sculpture wears custom suit courtesy of the David Bowie Estate from his Archive. 

“I thought it was so cool that he always was what he wanted to be. And created a world that he wanted to live in. That's really the feeling I try to capture in my art. To my community & me, Bowie felt like hope. He taught me how to grow out of the world that always told me ‘no.’”

“I first became aware of Bowie when I was a kid and my mother would play his music in the car. She always called it “real” music. And I think that sentiment really stands. His work really takes you into a different world and was so unapologetically himself. I really love his essence.”
